description: A practitioner of a particular style of martial arts known as "Extreme Rules". However, because she doesn`t adhere to the more traditional martial arts such as Karate, she is spurned by the mainstream martial artists. She is still a very determined girl. She idolises Kurusugawa Ayaka since the latter also happens to practice the same "Extreme Rules" form of martial arts.
name: Matsubara Aoi
